mapper.select: SELECT b.board_id, b.title, b.writer, b.inserted, b.updated, b.viewCount, b.isPublic, m.nickName, m.isAdmin FROM freeBoard b JOIN Member m ON b.writer = m.member_id WHERE m.isAdmin = 1 ORDER BY board_id DESC

SELECT b.board_id, b.title, b.writer, b.inserted, b.updated, b.viewCount, b.isPublic, m.nickName, m.isAdmin FROM freeBoard b JOIN Member m ON b.writer = m.member_id WHERE m.isAdmin = 0 GROUP BY b.board_id ORDER BY b.board_id DESC LIMIT #{from}, #{items}
SELECT COUNT(CASE WHEN m.isAdmin=0 THEN 1 END) countBoard FROM freeBoard b JOIN Member m ON b.writer = m.member_id
SELECT b.board_id, b.title, b.content, b.writer, b.inserted, b.updated, m.nickName FROM freeBoard b JOIN Member m ON b.writer = m.member_id WHERE b.board_id = #{board_id};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO freeBoard (title, content, isPublic, writer) VALUES (#{title}, #{content}, #{isPublic}, #{writer})
mapper.update: UPDATE freeBoard SET title = #{title}, content = #{content}, isPublic = #{isPublic}, updated = NOW() WHERE board_id = #{board_id}
